entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Brandon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:33 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -31.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brandon Airport 07:00 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -31.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -45
Dewpoint: -34.5°C
Wind: W 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this morning. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 30. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
